description: McDonald says that earlier in his career, he tended to avoid writing about himself directly in songs. He opens up about his life and career in the memoir, What a Fool Believes.
title: With age and sobriety, Michael McDonald is ready to get personal

description: From Billie Eilish to Bad Bunny, JT to J.Lo, boygenius to Ice Spice, here they are: the home-run performances, the solid base hits and the outright whiffs.
title: 'SNL' just wrapped its 49th season: It's time to cruelly rank its musical guests

description: One of the best albums of 2024, Diamond Jubilee, isn't on streaming services. The artist who released it, Cindy Lee, has rejected the streaming era's demands to create something entirely their own.
title: How Cindy Lee became the music world's underground success story of 2024

description: Faliks draws from her Ukrainian-Jewish heritage and Mikhail Bulgakov's anti-censorship novel The Master and Margarita for a new album.
title: Pianist Inna Faliks traces musical odyssey from Soviet Ukraine via Faustian fantasy
